== Description ==
Deletes the specified blog option from the database.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$id|integer|The id of the blog to delete from.}}
{{Parameter|$key|string|The key of the blog option to be deleted.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(null)</tt>

== Usage ==
%%%<?php delete_blog_option($id, $key); ?>%%%
